> the pleb is ungovernable, that's why communism "will never work",

Agree, I heard something the other day I could almost agree with. 

Socialism could work in a monoculture. Which is likely why it works in Nordic countries. I think even then it would fall apart after a while due to human nature being to collect into groups. Gotta find out how you are better than your neighbor somehow. In a monoculture society though I can see how that could last for a few generations. Likely quite a well for at first. I think this is why we are starting to see resistance or tension in those idealized Nordic countries due to new cultures being introduced through mass migrations.

Thoughts?
